pages.text: It has come to my attention BaerCraft has a memory leak.$(br2)A memory leak is a failure in a program to release discarded memory (RAM), causing impaired performance or failure.$(br2)This should not cause any issues, unless closing in and out of worlds frequently or staying in-game for long periods of time until your

memory usage starts to max out. However, there has been more lag in single-player in recent updates that I did not notice until recently.$(br2)Please bare with me while I work on this and if youâ€™re having severe issues with your game, feel free to join our Discord and ask for some help making some potential optimizations!
